title: [ZED] Shock Blade Skin Does More Damage than SKT 1 Skin
body:
It Seems Faker intended more of a Challenge in his skin

I can  assume his skin does 10%  reduce damage to all champions, but moves/attacks 10% faster without showing it to all champions at a certain level.

Shock Blade with Thun Glyph does HIGHER Burst damage, with no weaknesses.


Test: League Skins does matter for certain damage bonuses/weakness.{{champion:238}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=NKP Zed Elite,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=8euG3Jg9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-26T22:50:53.939+0000)
>
> answeres?

Go to custom game with same runes masteries and items on both champions.

Test it on dragon.

Come back and post if they are actually different.
Check my Match History, literally my losses before and have been due to SKIN, this is a HIDDEN BUG, please report it
The only answer is that none of that is actually true.
